title: Title
text: Trust is a two way street and an integral part of any relationship. Sometimes this trust comes in the inherited form of a recommendation from someone else we may trust. Sometimes it needs to be earned over time. Regardless, trust is the bridge that connects us.

title: Title
text: I have many goals in this life. Some I'm sure I will achieve and others I'm sure I will miss. Regardless of the success or failure of my goals, the ultimate goal is to live a good life. And that goal will definitely be achieved.

title: Title
text: Beauty can be found all around us. Our eyes and ears are the gateway to wonderful sights and sounds. It is up to us to open our eyes to see and our ears to hear this beautiful world!

title: Title
text: The world can be a wonderful place when we all come together and unite in one purpose. The purpose can change and does not need to remain the same. The greater good is always a great purpose!

title: I Don't WANT To
text: I have found that in order to do the things I want to do, I must also do a lot of things I don't want to do. But knowing I will get to do the things I want to do, it makes it easier and more enjoyable to do the things I don't.
